reviews.sentence: Over and beyond the call of duty. The first keys that we were given did not work and the maintenance man down the hall let us in and got more keys for us. The staff was very helpful. Will stay here again if I need to be in the area again. The breakfast was very good and plenty to eat.

Friendly and excellent service. The hotel was in excellent shape. Even on a very warm day at the Christmas break things got warm but the maintenance staff did a great job at addressing the issue in the room. Breakfast and service was outstanding.

Kind of a so so stay. We have always stayed at this Embassy Suites. Sadly this is the first time that I wished I had stayed elsewhere. The hotel really needs to updated. The rooms need a good down to the baseboards cleaning and the the fixes like caulking and cracked sinks are pretty lame. So are the patches in the walls. Our carpet was wet from who knows what. I hope the updates that seem to be in the works do the trick because I have always loved staying here.

Think twice about hotel during renovations. Did n’t know hotel was under renovations. Noisy so could nt take afternoon nap. Pool and hot tub closed. Room was spacious and clean but extremely small bathroom. Housekeeper knocking on door at 9AM ready to open door. Breakfast was wonderful. Pictures on website did n’t match room or bathroom in any way. Overall disappointing. Looking for couple weekend instead it was intrusive. Only one elevator for awhile and stair door was LOCKED that really concerns me in event of fire. Free shuttle to nowhere. Did have pretty water feature in lobby though. Overall not what we expected. Hotelscom should be up to date on hotel renovations. Would have stayed elsewhere if I had time to change hotel. Bathroom was so small you literally had to stand behind toilet to close door.

Room was clean and spacious. Breakfast was good. They offered free drinks and snacks from 530 730pm. They should have closed this hotel during the renovation. We had an air compressor cutting on and off all night near our room. Do not stay here until the renovation is complete. This hotel is going through a total renovation. The pool is closed everything is wrapped in plastic. The elevators in the lobby looked like they did not work. Safety is a big concern.

I thoroughly enjoyed the room the evening reception and the breakfast. And free parking is always a plus. The front desk receptionist was amazing. I wish I could remember her name to give her well deserved credit and recognition. The hotel is under complete renovation which is a very good thing but of course it causes things to be a bit out of order. I almost want to complain about it but I should probably just revisit this location after the renovation is completed in Feb 18.
Under remodeling and a mesBreakfast lines were unreal.
Location. They were renovating which was not disclosed. The room was coated in dust and it was very noisy. The pool was closed for renovations. It was not worth the money.

Renovation descriptions were not accurate. I booked this hotel for the indoor pool and on the Expedia site it did not mention that the pool was closed for renovations. That was extremely disappointing. Otherwise the stay was fine. Breakfast was delicious as usual.

great location will be a very nice hotel once the renovations are done staff said completion due march 2018. Also loved that they had complementary breakfast and complimentary evening wine beer. biggest problem was that we were not informed when booking that there are major renovations going on including the pool area being closed. A few minor issues with cleanliness things such as wine glasses left in lobby the morning after evening reception.
The updates of the hotel were excellent and the quality of customer service given was superb.

Beautifully renovated with excellent breakfast and wonderfully appointed rooms. Only complaint Is that the soundproofing of the facility is lacking. The configuration of the rooms by the elevators results in guests gathering outside your door. Lots of young children were screaming and running outside in the late evening hours. I had just request not to be near the elevator next time.

The hotel is quite nice after it is renovation. The staff is friendly and helpful. The food is good and the rooms are very clean. They removed their hot tub which is disappointing but the gym was not bad and the pool but I never saw one person in the pool over 4 days except me doing laps. The location caters to business travelers which is 90 of my trips so it is overall great for me.
Beautiful hotel. Suites clean updated beds super comfy.
Nice place after the renovation. The staff are very friendly.
The rooms were clean and nicely updated and the free made to order breakfast was delicious. We had a wonderful stay.
Updated and comfortable stay. The staff at breakfast are great and the evening reception is a nice treat at the end of the day.

Great location newly renovated. King bed mattress not as comfortable as it looks. Hot breakfast was standard not too impressive. Hotel and rooms were very clean. Front desk staff friendly and all but one acomidating. Wifi free only in lobby unles you are a Hilton honors member or coupon holder. Families were enjoying indoor pool. Location of my room was great and noise level was minimal since adults acoupying rooms around me.

I normally stay at Embassy Suits which I really enjoy. This location has renovated since the last time I was here which looked very nice. The gentleman who originally checked us in was very rude and overwhelmed with people checking in at the same time. The cooked to order omelets is always a favorite of mine. The line could be long at times but still enjoyable. Our room was renovated however there was paint chipping dents in the refrigerator two stains in front of the refrigerator and peeling paint from the walls. My stay was during a spring break which had a lot of children there. I did not complain to the front desk because I did not feel like dealing with the same person who checked me in. Overall not a bad stay but would have appreciated being greeted a lot better.

Very clean updated look and the breakfast is excellent. The rooms are very quiet and the only sound we could hear in the room was the waterfall in the atrium which was muted and very peaceful. The beds were clean and surprisingly very comfortable. The evening reception is a nice extra with many beverage choices and a few light snacks. The only issue we noticed was how warm the interior of the hotel was and the pool room was so stiflingly hot it might as well have been a large steam room. It will knock you down. At least you can get relief in your hotel room with the a c on. Also I do not think the mini fridge worked room 409 or maybe it was unplugged because it was room temperature inside when we attempted to use it for our take out leftovers.
